Dataset

# module.exports()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns dataset No ... ...

Create a new dataset with default settings 

dataset: {
}

# dataset.key()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns string No ... ...

Get the key identifying this dataset

# dataset.raw()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns any No ... ...

Get the raw data

# dataset.field(string query)

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
query string The field to find No No
Returns field No ... ...

Find a field within this dataset

# dataset.fields()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns Array.<field> No ... ...

Get all fields within this dataset

# dataset.extract(data-extract-config config)

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
config data-extract-config No No No
Returns Array.<datum-extract> No ... ...

Extract data items from this dataset

# dataset.hierarchy()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns null No ... ...

No description 

data-extract-config: {
  field: 'foo', // The field to extract data from.
  value: () => {}, // The field value accessor.
  props: , // Additional properties to add to the extracted item.
}

datum-extract: {
  value: , // The extracted value.
  source: { // The data source of the extracted data.
    key: 'foo', // The data-source key.
    field: 'foo', // The source field.
  },
}

Field

# module.exports()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns field Data field ... ...

Create a new field with default settings 

field: {
}

# field.id()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns string No ... ...

Returns this field's id

# field.key()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns string No ... ...

Returns this field's key

# field.tags()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns Array.<string> No ... ...

Returns the tags.

# field.type()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns string No ... ...

Returns this field's type: 'dimension' or 'measure'.

# field.min()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns number No ... ...

Returns the min value of this field.

# field.max()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns number No ... ...

Returns the max value of this field.

# field.title()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns string [description] ... ...

Returns this field's title.

# field.items()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns Array.<datum-extract> No ... ...

Returns the values of this field.

# field.formatter()

Returns a formatter adapted to the content of this field.
